commit.message:
expr.c (emit_group_store): Don't assert stack temp mode size.

2008-09-02  H.J. Lu  <hongjiu.lu@intel.com>

	* expr.c (emit_group_store): Don't assert stack temp mode size.

From-SVN: r139894
